description.@en: Beasts are pure, primal creatures who must be treated as equals—not as some potential trophy or cattle led to slaughter.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Threats classified as Animals or Beasts will never make you a target of attacks until you initiate violence toward them or their allies.
